modName: New Animation for Running with Bow
summary: Ever annoyed with vanilla bow running style. Somehow comparable for typical of \"orang utan\" walking style. Always trying other mod that replace it but not suit to your taste? Try this one if you desperate enough.... It solve the problem..In my case of course
descriptionHtml:
[center] 
[color=yellow]Ever annoyed with vanilla bow running style. Somehow it\'s comparable to typical of \"orang utan\" walking style. Always trying other mod that replace it but not suit to your taste? Try this one if you desperate enough.... It solve the problem..In my case of course.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/color]
If you want to use the animation only for your character use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14871]PC Exclusive Animation Path[/url]

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/16975-1-1337107571.jpg[/img]
[color=Jade][b]View from the front[/b]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/16975-2-1337107573.jpg[/img]
[b]View from the side[/b]
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~[/color]


VIDEO SAMPLE
=============

Special Thanks
=============
Atomic weasel
fidget
fore
Bethesda, since inspiring me to replace the \"angry-ape\" run motion

AWESOME MOD [ADVERTISEMENT]
=====================================
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17077]Belua Sanguinare by MofoMojo and Jakisthe[/url]
[color=yellow]A massive and deep overhaul of Vampirism in Skyrim. \"...Previous mods made feeding a quirk that vampires could do - for our mod, it\'s integral to the experience and allows for a much more fluid balance between being a monster and a human. Vampires are not blood mages, they\'re not gods, they\'re vampires....[/color][by Jakisthe at 09:29, 15 May 2012]\"
